name: Dubsi
author: Dubsi.

sections.description: Dubsi is a web commenting tool that allows casual users to easily express and share their thoughts on any picture from any website.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload dubsi.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now if you want to have control over your photos comments, follow these steps:
    • Login to your blog using Admin account and go to administration part
    • Click on “Settings” and then click on “Dubsi”
    • Click on “Activation” button to activate your account on Dubsi as a site owner
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin on my WordPress site for free?

Yes, Dubsi plugin for WordPress is absoloutly free

Can I Delete comments that I receive on my blog/website photos from Dubsi users?

Yes, as site owner, you have full control on the comments that other Dubsi users sent on the photos of your web site.
